Action.label: 位置解析
Action.Str: var h=global('HTTPD');var r = /\\u([\d\w]{4})/gi; h = h.replace(r, function (match, grp) { return String.fromCharCode(parseInt(grp, 16)); } ); h = unescape(h);setGlobal("%Httpd",h);

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%stscreenlocked Screen currently locked True or false</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%stkeyguardshown Keyguard shown True if currently shown false otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%stkeyguardsecure Keyguard secure Keyguard is secure with pin/password/pattern</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2></StringArray>
